title: Educational Research and Evaluation Design C—Qualitative Methods
description: This course integrates a variety of social and behavioral science perspectives and research methodologies in examining topics of central relevance to education. Students have opportunities to learn a variety of quantitative and/or qualitative methodologies. Letter grades only. EDS 287C is one of three courses in the series. Prerequisites: EDS 287A, EDS 287B, and EDS doctoral student (ED81 or ED82), or consent of instructor.
